name: text
description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the back to top component. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

name: html
description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the back to top component. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

name: href
description: The value of the link href attribute.
